description: Olympus tag definitions with embedded PrintConv implementations

tables.description: Olympus equipment information (0x2010) - camera and lens identification
Olympus camera settings (0x2020) - exposure, focus, metering modes
Olympus raw development settings (0x2030) - color space, processing engine
Olympus image processing settings (0x2040) - art filters, processing
Olympus autofocus information (0x2050) - AF points, focus areas
Olympus main maker notes table - scene modes, flash, WB, sharpness (~40 PrintConv entries)
